Generate a summary of the following passage using only five sentences We live in a world where technology advances at a rapid pace each year. Every couple of months, it seems like a new innovative gadget appears on the market. Computers have been around for decades, but they have become faster and more capable with each passing year. Mobile phones were once a luxury item that few people had, but now they are ubiquitous. With the advent of 5G networks, the internet is faster and more reliable than ever.

Summarize the following passage using not more than 5 sentences. The use of face masks in public is becoming increasingly common. This is because face masks help to reduce the transmission of viruses and other diseases, such as the seasonal flu. Face masks also act as a deterrent to prevent people from touching their face, which is a common way of transmitting viruses. In addition, wearing a face mask can serve as a sign of respect to those working to protect the public’s health.
